p: where (OD t) ECV is the optical density measured with a given concentration of the test compound in ECV-infected cells; (OD c) ECV is the optical density measured for the control untreated ECV-infected cells; and (OD c) mock is the optical density measured for control untreated mock-infected cells. The therapeutic index was defined as 50% cytotoxic concentration (CC 50)/IC 50.
